thread.title: BRIEF-Emerson-Signed Multi-Year Contract With Repsol To Provide Paradigm Exploration & Production Software Suite

title: BRIEF-Emerson-Signed Multi-Year Contract With Repsol To Provide Paradigm Exploration & Production Software Suite

organizations.name: provide paradigm exploration & production software suite reuters

text: March 27, 2018 / 1:08 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Emerson-Signed Multi-Year Contract With Repsol To Provide Paradigm Exploration & Production Software Suite Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Emerson Electric Co: * EMERSON-SIGNED MULTI-YEAR CONTRACT WITH REPSOL TO PROVIDE PARADIGM EXPLORATION & PRODUCTION SOFTWARE SUITE ACROSS REPSOL GLOBAL EXPLORATION OPERATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
